content: I don’t understand how you turned a story with a ton of potential into a politically-fueled, broad-brush rant about the other guy’s party. For the record, I’m a fiscal conservative and a social “don’t-be-a-dick-ican,” so this isn’t even entirely my fight. But by casting such a wide net and blaming shitty behavior on anyone who prefers smaller government — as if there are no compassionate conservatives — you’re helping to widen the political chasm in this country. Instead of telling the story of a hard working woman who struggles, as many Americans do; instead of helping to find unity in this country, you’ve contributed 6 more minutes toward creating resentment and hate. Congratulations. You’re part of the problem.
